Sebastian Rosengren

I'm one of those guys that code thingamajigs, sometimes for mobile devices, but mostly for the web using Javascript and css/less.

Github

Fork me! I try to package some of the things that I build and put them on Github for anyone to use. I'm also the creator of Tily, a css based fluid tile system.

Blog

I sometimes (very seldom) write about stuff, mostly technical gotchas that I find while working.

Twitter

I do tweet a bit, much of it are retweets of things I find interesting. But sometimes I tweet to pimp my projects, does honesty deserve a follow?

Powered by Jekyll, hosted on Github, compiled using Ruby and Python by a .NET guy.
